CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starfall Organics relative to Sunstone Farms?
SRP.A: Starfall Organics is {below} Sunstone Farms in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Sunstone Farms?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {below} Sunstone Farms in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starfall Organics relative to Ironwood Ranch?
SRP.A: Starfall Organics is {below} Ironwood Ranch in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Ranch}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Golden Harvest Cooperative's minimum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative's minimum Crop Yield is in {1999}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Ranch's maximum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch's maximum Crop Yield is in {2000}.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 1978 higher or lower than in 1993?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 1978 was {lower} than in 1993.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 1981 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 1981 was {higher} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1991, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 1997 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1984 and 1991 was {lower} than between 1997 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1991, did the total Crop Yield experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total crop yield between 1987 and 1991 was {larger} than between 1988 and 1996.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Ranch} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Sunstone Farms and Ironwood Ranch first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Sunstone Farms and Ironwood Ranch did not exchange leading positions.
